text: In light of current concerns regarding viral-induced cytokine storms, poly (ICLC) appears to have potential to stimulate the innate immune system and thus provide protection. As poly (ICLC) stimulates IL-12 it would theoretically be an effective adjuvant for generating cross-protective antibodies thus expanding the number of people that could be immunized. Use of poly (ICLC) as an adjuvant requires lower doses than when used solely for prophylaxis [54] , thus alleviating some of the toxicity concerns associated with their use.
